ygData.subject: Monk Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings! Remember the Wolverine thing I was speaking about? Its called a Death Claw. Some one spotted a GM with one.... Mua Hahaha! Mwa Hahahaha!
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings!

Remember the "Wolverine" thing I was speaking about? Its called a Death Claw. Some one spotted a GM with one....

Mua Hahaha! Mwa Hahahaha! <<Sinister Laugh>> But what if it turns out to be a 1H Slash instead...?

Anyways, if I manage to get my sorry ass to Freeport. Make sure you people bring me around sightseeing. I visited the Aviak Village yesterday and will be making my way to the Centaur Village.

I am still looking to get Netted/Woven/Mesh.

Wilson
